Articles.Content: II used several mk2 drone cores for reaction wheels.... So what counts as center? The fuel tanks?

II used several mk2 drone cores for reaction wheels.... So what counts as center? The fuel tanks?

Whatever part the ship is built around - when it's destroyed the ship name changes to "NAME ship" or "NAME probe" and it will say "No Target" meaning the core part has been killed.

When you target a ship, the target is the core part automatically.

OK. So once it changes to no target or whatever probe etc., that ship is destroyed? OK. Makes sense.

Whoah! 8 rep power?!??!?!?!?!?

OK. So once it changes to no target or whatever probe etc., that ship is destroyed? OK. Makes sense.

Whoah! 8 rep power?!??!?!?!?!?

Yep, ship destroyed when core part is destroyed, or if it's incapable of movement, out of ammo, or out of power (refer to first post's specifics for that, but I assume you know those rules )

Lol, yeah, 8 rep bars, the past few months have been good for me and a good 600 of that after the August Apocalypse alone.

Yep, ship destroyed when core part is destroyed, or if it's incapable of movement, out of ammo, or out of power (refer to first post's specifics for that, but I assume you know those rules )

I've set up my ships on Gilly, zekes: named: ATLANTIS A, B, and C

SO IT BEGINS Starting turn now.

EDIT: are your ships all right? They are full tanks but the engines have no fuel.

EDIT EDIT: Can I make one little rule - that is an enemy ship goes on a collision course with Gilly, you leave it alone, and not let it crash into the planet, or if you do, at least watch it land, so it doesn't just disappear in warp That would be too easy, as the low orbit speeds are going to bump our craft on sub-orbital trajectories all the time.

Edited December 29, 2014 by zekes

SO IT BEGINS Starting turn now.

I'm really at a loss on how the battle would turn out. Wait are you using your new 230 ton Drekevak XXX Battlecruiser or are you using the old Heavy Drekevak Mk XXVII-III or Drekevak Mk XIV-XI.

Please use the NEW ONE you've just built (the one with the sneak preview, what model is that by the way?)

SO IT BEGINS Starting turn now.

EDIT: are your ships all right? They are full tanks but the engines have no fuel.

EDIT EDIT: Can I make one little rule - that is an enemy ship goes on a collision course with Gilly, you leave it alone, and not let it crash into the planet, or if you do, at least watch it land, so it doesn't just disappear in warp That would be too easy, as the low orbit speeds are going to bump our craft on sub-orbital trajectories all the time.

The fuel lines must have been cut, wait let me check it. If it doesn't have fuel just fill it with hyperedit and let's start. I may have forgotten to check it.

I'm really at a loss on how the battle would turn out. Wait are you using your new 230 ton Drekevak XXX Battlecruiser or are you using the old Heavy Drekevak Mk XXVII-III or Drekevak Mk XIV-XI.

Please use the NEW ONE you've just built (the one with the sneak preview, what model is that by the way?)

Oh yeah don't worry, I'm not using the boomers (the 14-gun XXXs would be so out of place here - they're for long-range, they have 15 km/s D/V in them)

I'm using the new Drekevak Mk XIV-XII P (as seen in the preview ). They are 155 tonnes, 844 parts, and have 6 "Popper H" Missiles. Here's a full view of her in SPH, with data cencored via potato screenshot.

I've set up USSZS Quartzite, USSZS Victoria, and USSZS Agusta in lower Gilly orbit. Quartzite will fire first, I'm about to rendezsouves with your nearest vessel

The fuel lines must have been cut, wait let me check it. If it doesn't have fuel just fill it with hyperedit and let's start. I may have forgotten to check it.

I'll send you the persist, so you can fix your ships. My ships are there, but I'm still going first, you just fix the ships and send it back
